attributes.action: Request the ruling for mandatory quarantine on return from France is reversed.
attributes.additional_details: This ruling needs to be urgently reviewed, many people are affected by this new ruling. Holidays ruined and financial implications imposed.
attributes.background:
The Beta variant is not in mainland France it is in La reunion, which is one of the twelve overseas territories of France.
It is an island in the Indian Ocean, the shortest flight between France and Reunion is 5,709 miles and takes over ten hours to arrive.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592771
